entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO SOUTH 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY

LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
